reviews.review_text: Great Toddler/Mommy McDs with large, enclosed play place, climbing structure 2y+, ordering/pay station inside play area, high chairs, NO wifi access, bathroom not in play area, & dirty but not horrid. They had pancakes allday in happy meal & lots of parking. I d recommend, if you need a place to work & eat , while children run in circles screaming. There are many screaming children. Kid-friendliness: Bathrooms, enclosed play area, large climbing structure with slide & padded area. 2yr -12yrs, high chairs, room for strollers, trash, bathrooms Wheelchair accessibility: All on one level, handicapped parking, room in restaurant for wheelchairs

This McDonalds has a great location spot next to Science World and the stadium. Surprisingly, it has free parking with a big parking lot. Its open 24/7 for dine in, take out, and drive through. Kid-friendliness: Has an indoor playground

Well the reason Im giving them a 5 star is because there security caught the thief who actually stole the kids meal I had on the table so when I took little man I was looking after to the restroom so guy took his food and his box of doughnuts and actually drank out of my coffee cup but they handled with respect and I appreciated that from them plus the other people around us where super nice
It was fairly quick with a full line up frendly staff on the drive through

Consistently THE WORST drive thru service. I am asked to pull over and wait a minimum of 7 minutes every time I go. And every time, I have to walk in and demand my food...AND every single time the sauces I PAID FOR are not in the bag. The place is an absolute circus with food delivery guys, homeless, bums, addicted people lurking about everywhere. Its a zoo and the service is atrocious. Im DONE.
This Mc Donald center is fully automated. You can customize everything. Large variety in the menu and nice salad that I havent seen in any other branches before.
Changed my life. The finest 5 star cuisine Ive ever had, how have I never heard of this place? Its like McMagic in my mouth!

In the middle of a heat dome and it was unbelievably hot outside ... walking into the restaurants lovely, air conditioned interior was such a relief! It was crazy busy and totally chaotic but all the staff we dealt with were so friendly and pleasant. There was lots of parking outside and no line-ups at the ordering kiosks and the washroom was spotless. Altogether a great visit.
I have purchased 4 cars from these guys over the years and their service has been outstanding. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a used car in excellent condition!!!!

Clean atmosphere. Not enough staff in the evening, for over a month now there has only been one cashier witch causes slower lines not everybody has a bank card to  pay with online. This also cause customers to get frustrated and angry and even sometimes cause a scene with staff members,  unfortunately One customer was extremely  frustrated he told a staff member to f@#(c) off and the staff member behind the counter said exactly the same words right back to the customer before he walked out.. I have Never experienced this at a McDonalds. Not the staff members fault but if there was more cashiers at the front maybe that could have been avoided.
The place  had a great experience with STAFF and Customers. Very nice,I will go Back.
Quick burger snack for lunch, always fast and tasty
Big place. Clean, I enjoy dine in

Been coming here every Saturday morning for breakfast, and every time I have quality service and food. There are mornings when the line up to the drive-thru is out to the street and we are only in line for 5 mins total and have our food. Other locations have us park and wait 10+ minutes even with no line. All employees work fast but politely. The food is always so fresh and hot. Could not recommend this location enough!
This place is a zoo but they had shamrock shakes in may so they get 5 stars

Best thing about this particular McDonald would be the staff. From the Paladin guard that is always alert and courteously opens the door for customers to the guys in the kitchen. Ive dined here three times and each time these guys seem to actually enjoy doing their jobs. Big up to them
Great customer service. Went their around 12:15 and girl named Amrit took my order. She was really polite and humble. Great customer interaction.

As with most McDonalds, Ive had varied experiences but ill just share my most recent one as it was excellent.  The line up in the drive through was long and extended onto the street and through the parking lot. I couldnt believe how fast I got through, especially from ordering to payment to receiving my food. I thanked the lady for being so quick, and enjoyed my food which was hot and made how I asked. Yum!
Great food n drinks
I got a shamrock McFlurry and it was great but man they gotta do something the atmosphere it felt like I was entering the bowels of the earth.
Good service. Tasty. Modest price
Fast friendly service and exactly what I ordered.  Great work team. Keep up the good work.

Very very friendly, efficient, & quick service. This drive through was what drive throughs should all be like. Correct order taking, very friendly & well spoken, good at up selling products, & making sure the customer gets the food hot, well prepared, & properly bagged. This was my best tasting, & well bagged Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese meal since the 1980s Special Kudos to this worker. Management should recognize her for her abilities & her #1 standards. ********** Stars for her

Its McDonalds the best munchies ever omnomnomn Vegetarian options: Theres beyond meat available Dietary restrictions: Fish allergens peanut allergens Parking: If your a customer you dont have to worry about paying for parking Kid-friendliness: No play place however theres an upstairs where kids can be loud and run around Wheelchair accessibility: Its ground level so no need to find a ramp

For the location and the how clean the restaurant is and the added security. It s a the only place I found that I can bring my small children into where no one is sleeping In the chair s Thanks again the people working in the back are amazing staff.
Today the chicken mcmuffin was the best I have ever had since it they came out both were very fresh. Soft cheese, soft muffin and tender chicken.  Congrats  well done. Keep it up.
Always got to love the artery clogging slopes that they serve here. May not be good for you but sure does taste delicious
I love the self checkout that they have, very convenient and theres never much of a wait even though tons of people were there!
Drive thru worker. Phenomenal

After 1 year of lockdown been ( 2 yrs ) been to McD locations on Main! Have to say it was not a disppointment for an early dinner ( 2Can Dine coupon ). 1/4 pound cheese burger and also bought ( coupon ) 6 mini doughnuts ( acceptable, not the best compare to Cardems,Luckys doughnuts ) but its tasteful. The meals was amazing and its services! Worth the trip/back!
Great place to eat and love the staff
Its fast and good service
Very fast service . Food was actually put together properly and not sloppy. Like most other restaurants of the same.

Incident from 11th Nov. I wanted to thank the security guard from Paladin working that morning. Tall Indian Guy, He bravely defended us again 2 homeless people who were kicking our car doors and were threating us. He made sure we were safe and kicked them out. Thank you so much. I came to personally thank him multiple times but never saw him after that, as we rushed out that day, we were really scared. Thank you so much for your service.

Used to work here, great people and managers. However dont stay after 10 pm, then its claimed by junkies. Watch for needles in washrooms, bags, crannies, toilet paper dispense. Also once saw a dude in the garbage compactor.

Its a McDonalds, but Im always amazed at how fast the drive through provides service. Good location (for McDonalds, lets not get me wrong here, its not good actual food). I fill my breakfast sandwich needs here regularly.

Great service...Id ordered a double Big Mac and when I got to the Van to eat it with Rocky my pitbull...I found just a double burger not 4. I went back and they gave me my proper order and let me keep the double. Rocky real my enjoyed it.

This used to be one of dirtiest McDonalds in north America due to homelessness and people with low personal care in its surroundings.  Washrooms where dirty, a lot of people very spending more than usual time in the lobby. BUT NOW!!!!!!!!! After having doors at its North West entrance closed, and having security at its main entrances, there are no more unrelated people hanging around. Even doordash and uber eats receive their deliveries from the security officer making it even more professional. Now I can tell the management worked hard to re- establish this place. I really hope this place holds their security officer which is very polite and professional. I also hope other McDonalds with busy downtown traffic to employ security officers , especially once covid is over and night clubs re opens.
Best time to come to this location is late at night when theres only several groups dining and not a lot of people in line waiting for their food. The staff are very nice here.
Nice place
I ordered from Uber eats. Incredibly fast! My burger was made to my specifications. Perfectly. Lol thank you for my cookie! An excellent encounter! I love you guys!
The free fries are too good lol.. the new cigarettes
Great for a quick snack any time of the day. Menu as expected.
The staff are so aware and gracious I asked them for additional condiments and they immediately gave me Thank you so much I ll always buy from them
Very consistent! I think they have yet to mess up my order and Ive visited this location MANY times. Plus the staff are friendly and have a great sense of urgency.
Quiet place. Nice view. For the rest, just an ordinary MacDonalds :)))
Great stop when walking along the creek because they have a washroom
It was spectacular. Food elevates mood and the fine dining experience elevated me to hitherto unknown realms of clarity and inner peace.
This McDonalds food was pretty good. I liked my big Mac like I always get.  And always the best after a fat joint...
My first experience with this restaurant was amazing but the location was great and easy for us to find and the price was great

I absolutely love McDonalds coffee and have no shame in saying it! Theyre coffee isnt too hot when you get it, and the taste is just so good! If youre ever looking for just a black coffee and dont want to break the bank..... Orrrr seriously just really want a good coffee, get theirs. I drink mine with 4 cream (yes, always and no it hasnt made me fat haha) I love that I buy 7 coffees and get a free one as well! The food is alright as well if you like carby stuff haha

[REVIEWED IN OCTOBER 2019] This McDonalds is a nice, large, but busy location, with plenty of comfortable seating areas to settle in. I came here & paid so I could use their WiFi to play World of Warcraft. Found out WoW was unplayable for whatever reason, despite other online games working okay. Rated 5 stars despite this disappointment, but its a pretty awesome McDonalds location. 24 hours at that!
It was nice but wierd. A stranger cleared it ,told me I should sit there, I ate my big Mac, ( alone but not) with barriers,I had a covid good time . I guess Today I made it to 59 yrs..

The paladins slinging grease in this citadel of soberiety are the last line of defense against the quarreling, drunken horde stumbling back toward the skytrain after striking out in Gastown. God bless them in their solemn duty.
Its nice and clean. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. McDonalds does everything right it seems!
This McDonalds is one of the best in Vancouver.  Very friendly and helpful staff provide a very pleasant overall order experience.  Keep up the great work
Nice day

Very sloppy burgers leaves you running straight to the bathroom! UPDATE: Since Ive last left this review. Ive notice that this particular McD has been making their burgers more with care, rather than the sloppy mess that i have been getting from here before.
Good location. Not much different than any other one but they are quick and give great service. Can get crazy busy at some hours.
Very well kept cleanliness of restaurant two thumbs up no mess ups on my order as well another plus

This location is one of the busiest McDonald s in town. I really give the employees credit for staying relatively cheerful throughout the day, even though this location gets quite a colourful variety of patrons.
I went thru the drive thru and it didnt take too long. The food was great service was good.
Cause of whip cream on my hot cakes umm good

Oh man. Only come here if youre drunk or high. If youre sober, you better be going through the drive-thru. Otherwise, youll be seeing all the magnificent disgusting people who come here on Friday night on Wednesday afternoon.
Always fast. I order from the app and get it for pick up and its usually ready by the time Im there.
Not really sure why they were nervous during the work
The seating situation has changed due to covid-19 but the place is very clean and hand sanitizer are everywhere and ready to be used.
Very busy but fast service coffee was perfect they made it just right cause I like my coffee on the cold side thanks keep up the good work
Staff are great. They can handle the chaos...  Have always had a good experience here, order is always correct. Staff is kind and helpful
Dont know how long McDonalds have been in town but I was really surprised by how good the dining experience is. I think it will catch on.
If you have kids. You can dine and let your kids play

The service is really good but the boys washroom is really dirty I am really scared of the washroom but the food and service is very very good the mangers are very nice also the soft serve ice cream that they make is really big and yummy
Excellent fast service. Cleaning person Wednesday am was very friendly and efficient. Meal was hot. Excellent all around outlet.

Just love the service of this place....   I had a wound on my hand which started bleeding suddenly... So I asked them a band aid... Nd the staff nd the manager was so nice... That they offered me the first aid asap..  thank you so much for your help
Restaurant was clean first friendly service order was correct and served hot and fresh.
For lunch today, I had a Dijon Onion Burger, & it was delicious. It was only $2.99. I should have had two, however, as one wasnt quite enough to satisfy my hunger!
Busy restaurant with large parking lot. Staffs are friendly and efficient. Foods are within the standard. I appreciated and thanks they have a security guard in the restaurant.
Big one, not so clean    but cleaner than most others
Went thru the drive thru and the service was very fast and the staff were polite and they were able to get our whole order correct  :)
Bah dah dah daaah i am lovin it and alittle secret smiles are free;)
In near downtown, this is the best McDonalds. The most I like is, this has parking lot. The cons are you will see lots of homeless, washroom is dirty.
Excellent quality control on the chicken nuggets. Consistently deliver a highly nutritious meal.
Outside clean washroom clean too good foods chicken  fish so good,coffee  can u make  a little hot drink better thx
Busy, basic not trendy but they never let down.. good food and good service.
Food service is awesome and was clean in the dining area. Cant complain at all.
The food is good love it its so awesome n the bigmac meal I love the most
Was pretty good they one of the good McDonalds around always clean and they treat the customer like customers no judgemental all
Despite location being somewhat sketchy, this location manages to keep clean and provide good service and food cooked to exacting standards.
Same McDonalds as everywhere. Crazy fast service and automated order kiosks everywhere! Kudos to the staff for being good at handling the local demographics of the DTES area.
probably the most cursed mcdonalds in Vancouver however immensely blessed at the same time
Surprisingly clean, staff must be incredibly patient. Theyve rarely ever messed up my order
Wonderful play structure my kids enjoy. Also, new upstairs dinning area is clean, and airly.
Friendly staff and good cooks. One of the best McDonalds in Greater Vancouver, conveniently located downtown by Science World, Via (train and bus station), Skytrain and close to Chinatown.
Gotta love McDonalds    Food was perfect as usual here too!
Lots of parking spaces. Clean place with security agent always available. Staff are quick and good in service.
All McDonalds are the same however this particular one has the highest ratio of junkie to staff in the Pacific Northwest. Thats a fact.
Floors werent sticky at all
It was busy but staff were very efficient and organized.
Good location and good service even in the pandemic. Access to washroom too and security personnel by the entrance for assistance.
Dont blame them if youre fat.  They have salad and its not their fault if you dont choose it.
